properties.name: operation
properties.description: Copy a file

options.name: Copy
options.description: Copy a file

options.name: Delete
options.description: Delete a file

options.name: Download
options.description: Download a file

options.name: Get
options.description: Get a file

options.name: Search
options.description: Search files

options.name: Share
options.description: Share a file

options.name: Upload
options.description: Upload a file

properties.name: parentId
properties.description: The ID of folder to copy the file to. If not defined will be copied to the root folder.

properties.name: additionalFields
properties.description: A comma-separated list of attributes to include in the response. This can be used to request fields that are not normally returned in a standard response.

options.name: fields
options.description: A comma-separated list of attributes to include in the response. This can be used to request fields that are not normally returned in a standard response.

options.name: name
options.description: An optional new name for the copied file

options.name: version
options.description: An optional ID of the specific file version to copy

properties.name: fileId
properties.description: Field ID

properties.name: binaryPropertyName
properties.hint: The name of the output binary field to put the file in

properties.name: fileId
properties.description: Field ID

properties.name: additionalFields
properties.description: A comma-separated list of attributes to include in the response. This can be used to request fields that are not normally returned in a standard response.

options.name: fields
options.description: A comma-separated list of attributes to include in the response. This can be used to request fields that are not normally returned in a standard response.

properties.name: query
properties.description: The string to search for. This query is matched against item names, descriptions, text content of files, and various other fields of the different item types.

properties.name: returnAll
properties.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit

properties.name: limit
properties.description: Max number of results to return

properties.name: additionalFields
properties.description: Limits search results to items with the given content types. Content types are defined as a comma-separated lists of Box recognized content types.

options.name: contet_types
options.description: Limits search results to items with the given content types. Content types are defined as a comma-separated lists of Box recognized content types.

options.name: direction
options.description: Defines the direction in which search results are ordered. Default value is DESC.

options.name: fields
options.description: A comma-separated list of attributes to include in the response. This can be used to request fields that are not normally returned in a standard response.

options.name: file_extensions
options.description: Limits search results to a comma-separated list of file extensions

options.name: ancestor_folder_ids
options.description: Limits search results to items within the given list of folders. Folders are defined as a comma-separated lists of folder IDs.

options.name: scope
options.description: Limits search results to a user scope

options.name: size_range
options.description: Limits search results to items within a given file size range. File size ranges are defined as comma-separated byte sizes.

options.name: sort
options.description: Returns the results ordered in descending order by date at which the item was last modified

options.name: trash_content
options.description: Controls if search results include the trash

options.name: owner_user_ids
options.description: Limits search results to items owned by the given list of owners. Owners are defined as a comma-separated list of user IDs.

properties.name: fileId
properties.description: The ID of the file to share

properties.name: accessibleBy
properties.description: The type of object the file will be shared with

properties.name: useEmail
properties.description: Whether identify the user by email or ID

properties.name: email
properties.description: The user's email address to share the file with

properties.name: userId
properties.description: The user's ID to share the file with

properties.name: groupId
properties.description: The group's ID to share the file with

properties.name: role
properties.description: A Co-owner has all of functional read/write access that an editor does

options.name: Co-Owner
options.description: A Co-owner has all of functional read/write access that an editor does

options.name: Editor
options.description: An editor has full read/write access to a folder or file

options.name: Previewer
options.description: A previewer has limited read access

options.name: Previewer Uploader
options.description: This access level is a combination of Previewer and Uploader

options.name: Uploader
options.description: An uploader has limited write access

options.name: Viewer
options.description: A viewer has read access to a folder or file

options.name: Viewer Uploader
options.description: This access level is a combination of Viewer and Uploader

properties.name: options
properties.description: Whether the invited users can see the entire parent path to the associated folder. The user will not gain privileges in any parent folder and therefore cannot see content the user is not collaborated on.

options.name: can_view_path
options.description: Whether the invited users can see the entire parent path to the associated folder. The user will not gain privileges in any parent folder and therefore cannot see content the user is not collaborated on.

options.name: expires_at
options.description: Set the expiration date for the collaboration. At this date, the collaboration will be automatically removed from the item.

options.name: fields
options.description: A comma-separated list of attributes to include in the response. This can be used to request fields that are not normally returned in a standard response.

options.name: notify
options.description: Whether if users should receive email notification for the action performed

properties.name: fileName
properties.description: The name the file should be saved as

properties.name: binaryData
properties.description: Whether the data to upload should be taken from binary field

properties.name: fileContent
properties.description: The text content of the file

properties.name: binaryPropertyName
properties.hint: The name of the input binary field containing the file to be uploaded

properties.name: parentId
properties.description: ID of the parent folder that will contain the file. If not it will be uploaded to the root folder.

properties.description: Only emails from registered email addresses for collaborators will be accepted

properties.description: Whether to delete a folder that is not empty by recursively deleting the folder and all of its content

properties.name: options
properties.description: Whether the invited users can see the entire parent path to the associated folder. The user will not gain privileges in any parent folder and therefore cannot see content the user is not collaborated on.

options.name: can_view_path
options.description: Whether the invited users can see the entire parent path to the associated folder. The user will not gain privileges in any parent folder and therefore cannot see content the user is not collaborated on.

options.name: expires_at
options.description: Set the expiration date for the collaboration. At this date, the collaboration will be automatically removed from the item.

options.name: fields
options.description: A comma-separated list of attributes to include in the response. This can be used to request fields that are not normally returned in a standard response.

options.name: notify
options.description: Whether if users should receive email notification for the action performed

properties.name: updateFields
properties.description: Whether users who are not the owner of the folder can invite new collaborators to the folder

options.name: can_non_owners_invite
options.description: Whether users who are not the owner of the folder can invite new collaborators to the folder

options.name: can_non_owners_view_collaborators
options.description: Whether to restrict collaborators who are not the owner of this folder from viewing other collaborations on this folder

options.name: description
options.description: The optional description of this folder

options.name: fields
options.description: A comma-separated list of attributes to include in the response. This can be used to request fields that are not normally returned in a standard response.

options.name: is_collaboration_restricted_to_enterprise
options.description: Whether new invites to this folder are restricted to users within the enterprise. This does not affect existing collaborations.

options.name: name
options.description: The optional new name for this folder

options.name: parentId
options.description: The parent folder for this folder. Use this to move the folder or to restore it out of the trash.

options.name: shared_link
options.description: Share link information

options.name: access
options.description: Only those who have been invited to the folder

options.name: Collaborators
options.description: Only those who have been invited to the folder

options.name: Company
options.description: Only people within the company

options.name: Open
options.description: Anyone with the link

options.name: password
options.description: The password required to access the shared link. Set the password to null to remove it.

options.name: permissions
options.description: Whether the shared link allows for downloading of files

options.name: can_download
options.description: Whether the shared link allows for downloading of files

options.name: unshared_at
options.description: The timestamp at which this shared link will expire

options.name: vanity_name
options.description: Defines a custom vanity name to use in the shared link URL, for example https://app.box.com/v/my-shared-link

options.name: tags
options.description: The tags for this item. These tags are shown in the Box web app and mobile apps next to an item.

hints.text: The name of the output binary field to put the file in
The name of the input binary field containing the file to be uploaded

notes.name: Notes
notes.description: Optional note to save with the node

notesInFlow.name: Display Note in Flow?
notesInFlow.description: If active, the note above will display in the flow as a subtitle

alwaysOutputData.name: Always Output Data
alwaysOutputData.description: If active, will output a single, empty item when the output would have been empty. Use to prevent the workflow finishing on this node

executeOnce.name: Execute Once
executeOnce.description: If active, the node executes only once, with data from the first item it receives

retryOnFail.name: Retry On Fail
retryOnFail.description: If active, the node tries to execute again when it fails

maxTries.name: Max. Tries
maxTries.description: Number of times to attempt to execute the node before failing the execution

waitBetweenTries.name: Wait Between Tries (ms)
waitBetweenTries.description: How long to wait between each attempt (in milliseconds)

onError.name: On Error
onError.description: Action to take when the node execution fails

options.name: Stop Workflow
options.description: Halt execution and fail workflow

options.name: Continue
options.description: Pass error message as item in regular output

options.name: Continue (using error output)
options.description: Pass item to an extra `error` output

settings.note: Executable nodes have both common and executable settings
